text: Feldstonia is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family described as a genus in 1989.Short, Philip Sydney. 1989. Muelleria 7(1): 108Tropicos, Feldstonia P.S. Short There is only one known species, Feldstonia nitens, endemic to Western Australia.Flann, C (ed) 2009+ Global Compositae Checklist Florabase, the Western Australia Flora, Feldstonia nitens P.S.Short ==References== Category:Monotypic Asteraceae genera Category:Flora of Western Australia Category:Taxa named by Philip Sydney Short
title: Feldstonia
